title: Fingon rescues Maedhros from Thangorodrim
description: Fingon, with the help of Thorondor, rescues Maedhros from Thangorodrim.

title: Fingolfin becomes High King of the Noldor
description: Maedhros waives his claim to the High Kingship of the Noldor. Fingolfin becomes High King of the Noldor.

title: Thingol allows House Finarfin to enter Doriath
description: Following a visit from Angrod, Thingol allows the House of Finarfin to enter Doriath due to their close kinship with Thingol via Finarfin's wife, Eärwen

title: Noldor permission to occupy Hithlum and Dorthonion
description: Thingol, as the self-styled Lord of Beleriand, grants the Noldor permission to occupy the Hithlum and Dorthonion, as well as the lands to the east of Doriath.

title: Noldor hold council in Mithrim
description: The Noldor hold a council in Mithrim to discuss their relations with the Sindar; Angrod and Caranthir have an argument. The Sons of Fëanor decide to relocate to East Beleriand

title: Feast of Reuniting
description: Fingolfin, High King of the Noldor, hosts Mereth Aderthad - "Feast of Reuniting" - at the Pools of Ivrin. The joyous occasion was designed to create bonds of friendship amongst all the elves of Beleriand.
